snippet: Alfred Gwynne Vanderbilt and John Hay Whitney were elected posthumously to the National Museum of Racing’s Hall of Fame.
abstract: Horse breeders Alfred Gwynne Vanderbilt and John Hay Whitney are elected posthumously to the National Museum of Racing’s Hall of Fame.
lead_paragraph: Alfred Gwynne Vanderbilt and John Hay Whitney were elected posthumously to the National Museum of Racing’s Hall of Fame.

headline.main: Two Elected to National Museum of Racing’s Hall of Fame
headline.print_headline: Two Elected to Hall of Fame
